DOC.brief_summary: Study designed to measure simultaneously the width of both lateral ventricles of the fetal brain. Thus, will enable to evaluate the normal asymmetry that may exist between the right and the left ventricles during the pregnancy.
DOC.brief_title: Simultaneous Measurement of Both Fetal's Lateral Ventricles of the Brain
DOC.detailed_description: Study will enable to evaluate the normal asymmetry that may exist between the right and the left ventricles during the pregnancy.
DOC.criteria: low risk pregnant women high risk pregnant women
